```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```

First looks at what the gapminder dataset is

```{r}

class(gapminder)
names(gapminder)
summary(gapminder)

```

a basic plot of some things (population through time, for Canada)

```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  filter(country == "Canada") %>% 
  plot(pop ~ year, .)
```
